name: Caprese-Stuffed Chicken Breast with Balsamic Reduction
author: SunnyDaysNora
summary: This impressive stuffed chicken breast dish is easy to put together and so impressive! Perfect for any meal whether for family or company!
directions: Mix olive oil, garlic, onion powder, black pepper, and sea salt together in a bowl
Place chicken breasts in a shallow dish and pour marinade on top
Heat balsamic vinegar in a small saucepan to a slow boil
Allow to boil for 15 minutes, watching carefully to prevent burning
Cook until vinegar has reduced to half the original volume
Allow balsamic reduction to cool completely
Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Place 1/4 cup basil leaves, 2 ounces mozzarella cheese, and 1/2 a tomato on each piece of chicken
Roll chicken up and secure with toothpicks
Heat olive oil in an oven-safe skillet over medium heat
Add stuffed chicken breasts to skillet and sear on all sides, 3 to 4 minutes per side
Transfer skillet to the oven and bake until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 10 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
Allow stuffed chicken breasts to rest 5 minutes
Drizzle with balsamic reduction before serving
